comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Create a MapView 2. Choose DEFAULT_TILE_SOURCE as tilesource for the map 3. No map will be displayed What is the expected output? What do you see instead? A map should be displayed, but instead of maptiles i only see a grey grid. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? I tested OSM-library 3.0.8and 4.0 on Android 4.1.2 Please provide any additional information below. Logcat gives this output: 01-20 14:29:09.448: W/org.osmdroid.tileprovider.modules.MapTileDownloader(14138): Problem downloading MapTile: /14/8644/5291 HTTP response: HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden
